original_text: Is not the whole land before thee? separate thyself, I pray thee, from me: if thou wilt take the left hand, then I will go to the right; or if thou depart to the right hand, then I will go to the left.
korean_text: 네 앞에 온 땅이 있지 아니하냐 나를 떠나가라 네가 좌하면 나는 우하고 네가 우하면 나는 좌하리라

sentences.original_text: Is not the whole land before thee?
sentences.korean_translation: 온 땅이 네 앞에 있지 아니하냐?

sentences.original_text: separate thyself, I pray thee, from me:
if thou wilt take the left hand,
then I will go to the right;
or if thou depart to the right hand,
then I will go to the left.
